# Source Code

<template>
  <div class="w-100">
    <button class="btn btn-primary">Salve Rapaziada</button>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  // change this!
  name: "standard-component"
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.w-100 {
  width: 100vw;
  button {
    margin: 100px;
  }
}
</style>
